spoiler alert for squid game!!!!!!!

game 1: arrow keys

game 2: mouse

game 3: mouse

game 4: mouse

game 5: mouse

game 6: arrow keys

if you die you will get sent back to the title screen click PLAY and you will continue from where you left off <>

my original soundtrack + sfx wont cause copyright issues

there is blood in this game

if you get stuck on game 6 being forced to punch hold the left arrow key and mash space
